snippet: While Democrats have had most of the spotlight in the run for New York City mayor so far, the Republicans used Wednesday night to draw attention to themselves.
abstract: Leading Republican candidates for New York City mayor use televised debate hosted by NY1 to vow full support of Police Department and promise to limit role of inspector general monitoring department.
lead_paragraph: While Democrats have had most of the spotlight in the run for New York City mayor so far, the Republicans used Wednesday night to draw attention to themselves.

headline.main: Police Practices Take Center Stage at G.O.P. Mayoral Debate
headline.print_headline: Police Practices Take Center Stage at G.O.P. Mayoral Debate
